entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm64/Sve: ConditionalSelect(LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtend*) codegen #102904
  • .NET 8 application crashes on startup with error code 0x80008093 #102898
  • Q: System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc monitoring value conversion culture variance #102896
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc sampling #102895
    Future
  • [wasi] `async`/`await` on WASI #102894
    9.0.0
  • AOT warnings reported on partial classes #102893
  • [Mono] Using managed function pointers in non-llvm mixed AOT + interpreted environments leads to crashes #102891
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: expose funtionality found in: public static bool JsonReaderHelper.UnescapeAndCompare(ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Source, ReadOnlySpan<byte> other) #102890
    Future
  • Confused about NuGet package versions #102889
  • DI behavior change between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 #102888
  • [HttpStress] `H3_FRAME_ERROR` in Post Duplex Slow #102880
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: SveLoadMaskedUnOpTest.template needs more scenario #102878
  • Parameter name stripping breaks debugger #102873
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT generates native object without correct prefix #102869
    Future
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/Regressions/13362/Github13362/Github13362.cmd #102868
  • BadImageFormatException when mixing AOT and Interpreter assemblies #102867
  • Avoid instrumenting methods which trigger MinOpts #102863
    Future
  • Very Long JIT Times During ETW Rundown #102858

Closed

  • Add a generic host lifetime for Windows Forms #35998
    Future
  • GeneratedRegex generated class missing [Serializable] attribute #102892
  • LibraryImportGenerator unit test segfault illegal memory access #89054
  • ILLink shoud keep all metadata for rooted members #81979
    9.0.0
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes corrupt metadata tokens to IL stream for arrays of newly-declared types #102687
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] conflicting signatures for UCO #102844
    9.0.0
  • Version number on NuGet #102871
  • [API Proposal]: Add MediaTypeNames.Text.EventStream for server-sent events #102194
    9.0.0
  • 'Content-Length' header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #16162
    9.0.0
  • Exception in BlazorWasm applications due to NullabilityInfoContext usage #102848
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize counted loops by reversing them #100915
    9.0.0
  • Can "Math.DivRem" do division operation only once? #4155
    Future
  • Crash while jitting System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests in `Rationalizer::RewriteHWIntrinsicAsUserCall` #102840
    9.0.0
  • Tensor tests failing under jitstress with "Assertion failed 'gtEntryPoint == nullptr'" #102839
    9.0.0
  • When does the.NET SDK release support 26100? #102861
  • `LibraryImport` do not copy `this` #102690
    9.0.0
  • [Feature request]: Support instrumentation scope attributes on ActivitySource #93795
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Arm64/Sve: Implement LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtendTo* APIs #102903
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Expose additional metadata on the STJ contract model. #102902
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Update UnwindRegistersRestore.S #102901
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix NetworkInterface properties on Windows #102900
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Update armv6 image #102899
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Propagate profile flags to loop preheaders in `Compiler::optCloneLoops` #102897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable sending activation to dispatch queue threads #102887
    blocked, area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • Add fast path for linq count with predicate #102884
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Removes the redundant external condition #102883
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update docs.microsoft.com usages to learn.microsoft.com #102881
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Replace legacy __sync intrinsics with __atomic ones #102879
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restrict the maximum length of BigInteger #102874
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix computing new EH ranges in SubstitutedILProvider #102870
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `MemoryMarshal.CreateSpan` instead of `Span` pointer constructor in Number.NumberBuffer.cs #102866
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92901 #102862
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Added SVE LoadVector*NonFaultingZeroExtendTo* APIs #102860
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Avoid a few allocations in JsonContent #102859
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Ensure LoaderAllocator can't be collected while we clean handles on collectible LoaderAllocators #102872
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update Span.cs and ReadOnlySpan.cs to specify zero-based index values #102877
    documentation, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make span args to SearchValues.Create be params #102831
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-preview5] Fix STJ support for System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported = false #102876
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json
  • Revert linux_bionic image to unblock the official build #102849
    area-Infrastructure
  • Keep metadata for rooted members in ILLink #102850
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix incorrect metadata token written for array, pointer populated from TypeBuilder #102786
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [RISC-V] Fix Interop/StructPacking/StructPacking.dll Failure #102864
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add regression test for assembly origin for event marking #102836
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure that GenTreeIntrinsic doesn't incorrectly overwrite the gtEntryPoint #102843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix STJ support for System.Reflection.NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported = false #102852
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Add reasoning about loop trip counts and optimize counted loops into downwards counted loops #102261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate the 'this' keyword in LibraryImports #102793
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • Call NuGetAuthenticate after SetupNuGetSources #102846
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2463803 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use `where T : allows ref struct` in runtime #102795
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix `UnsafeAccessor`s with enum fields #102853
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Allow shuffle and other hwintrinsic that require a constant to stay intrinsic if the operand becomes constant later #102827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate `LCL_ADDR` nodes during local morph #102808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO REVIEW]Activate some H/3 tests and make usage of ConfigureAwait(false) more consistent on H/3 #102699
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • `Activator.CreateInstance` supports ByRefLike types #102636
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Baseline failing reflection and Regressions tests #102812
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Remove runtimeconfig.template.json from templates and provide it by default #102818
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove reserved registers from parameter homing temp reg candidates #102168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete -fms-extensions from coreclr native build #102834
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102063
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.x
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents #102238
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: GetActiveElementCount #102813
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Improve early returns for HashSet SubSet and SetEquals methods #102758
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • fix crossgen2determinism test #102742
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] LLVM version synchronization and verification #2599
  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for SwiftUI framework #2594

PullRequests

Created

  • Update official build to generate and upload NuGet packages to the feed #2600

Updated

  • tweaks to enable NativeAOT-LLVM on Linux with WASI-SDK 22 #2592
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge may24 #2591

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `dotnet nuget push --skip-duplicates` synonym for `--skip-duplicate` #41289
  • [Pipelines] Failed to Sync VMR Due to R2R Patch #41285
  • Add `dotnet nuget push --dry-run` #41284
  • Error during dotnet workload restore: Authenticode Signature Verification Failed #41286
  • Container tests started failing with the runtime insertion #41272
  • MU brings newer version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.App without corresponding version of Microsoft.NETCore.App #41277
  • [NetSDKE2E][ARM64]Although we installed the .netcoreapp 3.1 runtime, Test still executed failed and show "You must install or update .NET to run this application...". #41258
  • [NETSDKE2E]"Unhandled exception. System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly..." show in Output after running "dotnet test --arch x86." #41256
  • The latest .NET 9.0 SDK form designer cannot load #41250

Closed

  • How to integrate dotnet/installer into SDK and download the latest unpublished preview version, such as SDK release 9.0.100-preview6.xxxx for macOS's pkg file? #41137

PullRequests

Created

  • Increment branding to allow for razor hotfix #41287
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Aspire version to Preview 2 version #41274
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2463523 #41254
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix Aspire version to Preview 2 version #41275
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Use `src/<repo>/` as regex #41281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix build-configuration.json upload #41273
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix license scan test results path for trx files #41255
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix localization in .NET Workload Information Display #41225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • csc.exe hangs on specific file #73789
  • IDE0100 (Remove unnecessary equality operator) catches `x == false` as redundant #73787
  • Adding documents to a VisualStudioWorkspace in a subfolder fails if folder doesn't exist #73783
    Backlog

Closed

  • Version conflict detected for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp #73782
  • Visual Studio 2022 adds a duplicate "Option Strict On" to Code File When Pasting VB.NET Code #73771
  • Collection expression conversion failure should result in element-wise diagnostics #73297
  • Programación #73767
  • Change Workspace.Option setter to throw NotSupportedException #73778
    17.12
  • All analyzers from assembly Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeStyle.Fixes failed to load: Unable to load one or more of the requested types. Method not found: 'Boolean Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol.get_IsParamsArray()'. #73508
    17.11 P3
  • Regression: static initializer not run on class (worked with the old .NET Framework compiler) #73759
  • Remove Lazy Handler requirement from Roslyn LSP #63555
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address a few locations also need to care about partial properties #73792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Copy the ITelemetryReporter to a local before using #73790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Perform nav bar computation in two passes #73786
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781

Merged

  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add the LanguageServer folder to CODEOWNERS #73791
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Restore RazorCompiler EA layer for desktop #73697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve AddImport conflict detection performance #73780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid lambda allocation #73785
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move LanguageServer out of Features directory #73779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where FAR results were not getting sent until they were fully complete #73777
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement alg that determines which projects need to be restarted/rebuilt due to rude edits #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73774
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use a more sensible MEF export for brace completion #73756
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Prepare partial properties feature for merge #73773
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2463692 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Always use a by-value temp to capture a reference type receiver #73631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle nullability differences in duplicate interfaces #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove poison attributes #73751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73206
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "network error" - unhandled exception - Blazor WASM - Streaming http requests from IAsyncEnumerable api endpoint #55982
  • QuickGrid ItemsProvider called first time with Count=null when using Virtualize=true #55979
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55977
  • Perf regression: mapaction, multiple_queries #55976
  • ProjectTemplates instructions error #55975
  • Add a `Scope` property to the `Authorize` attribute #55973
    Backlog
  • HealthCheckMiddleware unexpected behavior, still running through the other middlewares in the chain #55972
  • Controller action with `Async` suffix causes issues when resolving url from `IUrlHelper.Action` #55967

Closed

  • Errors when publishing new Blazor WASM version (no nuget/framework updates) #55978
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext_spring #55959
  • Perf regression: endpoint #55966
  • route /_adminer.php throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #55974
  • Server Interactive Blazor Pages do not respect Sign-out with multiple browser tabs #55925
  • Facing an issue with a newly created ASP.NET Core MVC project. #55736
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Could not load file or assembly #55686

PullRequests

Created

  • Update https://docs.microsoft.com to https://learn.microsoft.com #55970
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests #55935
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6
  • Suggest git clean in Build Errors #55964
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Use more specific MSBuild property name for dotnet-getdocument #55958
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi, 9.0-preview6
  • Call NuGetAuthenticate after SetupNuGetSources #55960
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Update WithOpenApi docs and scrub description IDs #55924
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Remove redundant check #55945
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add nullable annotation to ResultContext<TOptions>.Result #55948
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Pass through CancellationToken #55941
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update AuthenticationSchemeProvider.cs public constructor summary punctuation #55919
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `6d79997` #55498
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Understanding metrics and memory usage of a .net app (seem mostly consume by cache and fragmentation) #4697

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Symbol] Add manifest generator #4693
  • Remove the symweb symbol server support #4694

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Preserving State and UI when App Returns from Background #22747
  • [Android] Numeric Editor's cursor is not visible when tapping it inside a ListView #22745
  • ListView duplicate first item #22742
  • PlatformBehavior.OnAttachedTo() is called twice during adding behaviour to a control #22740
  • Reinstate xml-docs build artifact for easier API docs publication #22736
  • MacCatalyst TAB key navigation only works if controls are inside of a ScrollView #22734
  • NamedFontSize ignores FontAutoScalingEnabled #22732
  • On Windows ListView doesn't visualise items when they have binded command with a parameter #22731
  • [Logging] Logs with "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.xxxx" as namespace tossing off Warnings anyway. #22730
  • Editor control: 1. OnMeasure event is not get called in iOS and 2. Unfocused event also not working if tapped outside of control. #22729

Closed

  • BoxView Opacity does not work in Android. #21558
  • [iOS] Crash because of FontIconSource #22682
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Click event fired even when button has views on top of it #22442
  • Click goes through solid elements on android #12014
    Backlog
  • Consider rounding numbers in `TransformationExtensions` #22513
    Backlog
  • Picker not opening when calling Focus() in .NET MAUI #22701
  • ImageButton border wrongly rendered (positioning and being clipped) #22738
  • iOS Notification Service Extension Deploy Fails #22586
  • Maui App using R8 & MauiHybridWebView crashes whenever it is killed in background by Android and then restarted by OS #22590
  • Connect To Mac - Object reference not set to an instance of an object #22722
  • After microsoft update Visual studio 17.10.1 Mac pair failed form last night 2024-05-30 #22733
  • Flyout shown for a moment when interacting with a backbutton in Android Shell #22649
  • [Android] Border doesnt expand on Content size changed #22606
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Windows] Some icon fonts not working in unpacked apps #21993
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Resource not found in .NET 9 when xaml-comp is false #22536
    9.0-preview5
  • Add Translucent Status Bar Setter to Community Toolkit #22706

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping - fix #22741
    community ✨
  • Update the WebAuth code to support Mac Catalyst #22739
  • Correct path to gather API docs artifacts in CI #22737
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Crash because of FontIconSource - fix #22726
    community ✨
  • Make sure to redraw the background drawable when the size is updated #22626
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
    area-drawing
  • Fix the FontImageSource for Windows Unpackaged #22646
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts

Updated

  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius -UiTest #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: bad sql generated when using string.Contains in a projection #33858
  • Query: optimize NOT (CASE WHEN x THEN 1 ELSE 0) by pushing NOT into the THEN/ELSE #33857
  • DbConnection is not always disposed along with DbContext #33855
  • Cosmos: support toplevel Any() #33854
    9.0.0
  • ToQueryString with Table Valued Parameter is missing the type name #33849

Closed

  • Is it possible to add arbitrary queries to run within the same transaction as SaveChanges? #33845
  • Index was outside the bounds of the array #33853
  • Check arity consistency when constructing `SqlFunctionExpression`s #33852
  • Performance got downgraded in context.Database.EnsureCreatedAsync() after Microsoft.Data.SqlClient upgrade from version 5.1.1 to 5.1.4(5.1.1-->5.1.4) #33847
  • Don't build the whole solution when using the command line tools #33850
  • Sequence annotations are not passed to code generation #33780
    9.0.0
  • Usefulness of TagWith() is diminished on SQL Azure "Query Performance Insights" UI - requesting workaround or feature to restore? #33772
  • SQLite provider returns 'different' decimal values from SqlServer. #33543
  • Make a rollback argument for migrations that rollback last migration #33834
  • Large TestResults files #33787

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve error message #33851

Merged

  • Pass sequence annotations (#33780) #33804
    community-contribution
  • Output test logging for query tests only on error #33819

Updated

  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • Skip sync tests in Cosmos #33756
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524

PullRequests

Created

  • Increment branding to allow for razor hotfix #19864
